profile.name: David
profile.title: Senior Software Developer in Thoughtworks
profile.description:
I'm a software developer currently employed by Thoughtworks as Senior Developer where I
constantly apply lean development, SOLID principles and testing best practices while
working in cross-functional teams with a product mindset.

I'm passionate about software architecture, learning new technologies and applying design
patterns to solve problems with a quality-first mindset.

challenges.description: Development of several clients products in a wide variety of technologies
Development of e-learning platforms in an Agile team with Kanban and Squad organization.
Development of one of the client products using Java, Spring and AWS
Participate in the development of the La Vanguardia and Mundo deportivo websites.
Participate in the maintenance of the La Vanguardia and Mundo deportivo websites.
Development of an application that controls the work-flow of the department

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
I'm a software developer with more than 9 years of experience currently employed by Thoughtworks as Senior Developer where I constantly apply lean development, SOLID principles and testing best practices while working in cross-functional teams with a product mindset.

I'm passionate about software architecture, learning new technologies and applying design
patterns to solve problems with a quality-first mindset.

I'm looking for a job where I have technical challenges and where I can learn new technologies. I don't visualize a job without agile, lean development, best practices and product mindset. I would love learn new lenguages like Python or Go.

I have a deep knowledge in Java and Kotlin as well as in oriented programming language, tdd, ddd, Docker, clean architecture and other concepts considered best practices.

I also have some experience with some frontend frameworks such as React and with scripting languages such as Python.

Last but not least, during the last 3 years, I have been working as a consultant where soft skills and communication are very important, so I have been focused on improving these topics, taking communication courses, and facilitating meetings.

One of the most important values in a job is if I'm comfortable in the team and in the company. I want to work in a place where there are no egos, no superheros, no lone wolves who control everything, no toxicity in the team.

I really believe that a safe space and the diversity make the team healthy, and a healthy team works better. I love to contribute to this healthiness.
